name: Bloodstream (itch)
description:
Action-Adventure game where you are the villain. Do a deal with the devil, take over the ruins to become the greatest threat of the land. Use your magic to protect yourself and destroy your foes, and become more and more powerful with powerful trinkets you can buy from the demon himself. A short fun game where you got to dodge and shoot everything around you, while also managing your energy bar so you dont become defenseless.”

This game mod was done with the free of use Demonoire in Construct 3.

This mod was made thanks to the university all our devs are studying currently on, ESNE.
